ruc and Pishes Emporium, previously known as Tina Turkis Good Time Bazaar, was a business located in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, within the infamous Guilds territory in the late 15 century DR.
Bruc and Pishes was a small two-story building with its entrance facing the hidden entrance down into the Guilds Guildhall bar and hideout. By the late 15 century DR, the business sign was old, broken, and rusted with "Bruc and Pishes Emporium" written on it as well as its previous name, "Tina Turkis Good Time Bazaar."
At some point before the Absolute crisis of the , Bruc and Pishes Emporium was abandoned and claimed by the Guild. During that time, the shop was used to store shipments of the Guild, as well as books, letters, and reports, including the Guilds communications with certain members of the patriar families of Baldurs Gate as well as with the Counting House.
